title.value: Art embroidery : a treatise on the revived practice of decorative needlework

source.value: Electronic reproduction of (manifestation): Lockwood, Mary S. (Mary Smith), 1831-1922. -- Art embroidery: a treatise on the revived practice of decorative needlework. By M. S. Lockwood and E. Glaister. With nineteen plates printed in colours from designs by Thomas Crane. -- London, M. Ward & co., 1878. -- 83 p. 19 col. pl. 32 cm. Call number of original: NK9100 L6

relation.value: Mary Ann Beinecke Decorative Art Collection

description.value: I. Introductory. -- II. On design. -- III. On colour. -- IV. On materials and stitches. -- V. On methods and uses. -- VI. On church embroidery. -- VII. On some kinds of lace. -- VIII. On the study of old needlework. -- IX. The plates
